member.name: IAppxEncryptionFactory5.CreateEncryptedBundleReader2
member.summary: Creates a read-only bundle object to which encrypted Windows app packages can be added, with an optional parameter for specifying the expected digest for the encrypted bundle.
member.param: A stream for reading the encrypted bundle.

Key info containing the base encryption key and key ID for decrypting the bundle. The base key is used to derive the per file encryption keys. If this parameter is null, the global test key and key ID are used.
An LPCWSTR containing the expected digest, a hashed representation of the bundle file.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an error code that includes, but is not limited to, those in the following table.
| Return code | Description | |-------------|-------------| | APPX_E_DIGEST_MISMATCH | The digest for the object doesn't match the digest provided in expectedDigest. |

member.name: IAppxEncryptionFactory5.CreateEncryptedPackageReader2
member.summary: Creates a new instance of for reading encrypted packages, with an optional parameter for specifying the expected digest for the package.
member.param: A stream for reading the encrypted package.

Key info containing the base encryption key and key ID for decrypting the package. The base key is used to derive the per file encryption keys. If this parameter is null, the global test key and key ID are used.
An LPCWSTR containing the expected digest, a hashed representation of the package file.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an error code that includes, but is not limited to, those in the following table.
| Return code | Description | |-------------|-------------| | APPX_E_DIGEST_MISMATCH | The digest for the object doesn't match the digest provided in expectedDigest. |

member.name: IAppxEncryptionFactory5
member.summary: Creates objects for reading encrypted Windows app packages and bundles.
